trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Zapewnia dostęp do funkcji aparatu syntezy zainstalowanych mowy.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new SpeechSynthesizer object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Podczas tworzenia nowego obiektu SpeechSynthesizer używa głos systemu domyślny.

trans-unit.source: To configure the SpeechSynthesizer to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Aby skonfigurować SpeechSynthesizer użycia jednej z zainstalowanych mowy głosy syntezie (tekst na mowę), należy użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać informacje o tym, które są zainstalowane głosy, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metody i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasy.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis: - To configure the output for the SpeechSynthesizer object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa udostępnia także kontrolować następujące aspekty syntezy mowy: — Aby skonfigurować dane wyjściowe dla obiekt SpeechSynthesizer, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Aby wygenerować mowy, należy użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer może utworzyć mowy z pliku tekstowego, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>obiekt, lub z [mowy syntezy Markup Language (SSML) w wersji 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: - To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Aby wstrzymać lub wznowić syntezy mowy, należy użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Aby dodać lub usunąć leksykonów, należy użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer umożliwia leksykonów co najmniej jeden przewodnik jego wymowy słów.

trans-unit.source: - To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: — Aby zmodyfikować dostarczania mowie, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer informuje o zdarzeniach po napotkaniu pewnych funkcji w monity: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: Zgłasza zdarzenia, które należy sporządzić raport na początku (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) i końcowych (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) z mowy operacji i po zmianie delikatnego głosu (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the SpeechSynthesizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Wywołania zawsze <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>przed zwolnieniem ostatniego odwołania do SpeechSynthesizer.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the SpeechSynthesizer object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: W przeciwnym razie używa zasobów nie zostanie zwolniona, dopóki moduł garbage collector wywołuje obiekt SpeechSynthesizer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metody.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Podczas inicjowania nowy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>wystąpienia, używa głos domyślny system.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Aby skonfigurować <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>użycia jednej z zainstalowanych mowy głosy syntezie (tekst na mowę), użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać informacje o tym, które są zainstalowane głosy, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metody i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasy.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Dodaje leksykonie do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Leksykonie wymowy jest kolekcją słów ani fraz wraz z ich wymowy, które składają się z liter i znaków z obsługiwanych alfabet fonetyczny.

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: Leksykonie służy do określania niestandardowej wymowy specjalistycznego słownictwa w aplikacji.

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Określone w pliku zewnętrznego słownika wymowy mają pierwszeństwo przed wymowy leksykonie wewnętrzny lub słownik syntezatorów mowy.

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Jednak wymowy określony wbudowany w monity utworzone za pomocą dowolnego z <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A>metody mają pierwszeństwo przed wymowy określone w dowolnym leksykonem.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: Wbudowany wymowy mają zastosowanie tylko do pojedynczego wystąpienia wyrazu.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Zobacz [leksykonów i małych liter fonetyczny](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) Aby uzyskać więcej informacji.

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter: - The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: Wiele leksykonów można dodać do obiektu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>. Dwie wartości są obecnie obsługiwane dla `mediaType` parametru:-wartość `application/pls+xml` wskazuje, że odpowiada leksykonie [wymowy leksykonie specyfikacji (PLS) w wersji 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: Jest to preferowany formatu do użycia.

trans-unit.source: - The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: — Wartość `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` oznacza, że format leksykonie nieskompresowanych słownika, czyli formatu Microsoft zastrzeżonych.

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: Jest to starszy format i zalecane jest użycie formatu PLS opisane powyżej.

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Lokalizacja danych słownika.

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Typ nośnika leksykonie.

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Wartości typu nośnika nie jest uwzględniana.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> napotka zakładki w wierszu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Zgłasza tego zdarzenia podczas przetwarzania wszystkich <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać informacje o dane skojarzone ze zdarzeniem zobacz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Można dodać zakładki przy użyciu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu i zwalnia zasoby używane w podczas sesji.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Działa ze względów bezpieczeństwa, aby wyczyścić zasoby w przypadku gdy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>nie jest wywoływana metoda.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera monit, który <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> jest czytanie.

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca obiekt monit, który jest aktualnie używany.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca wszystkie zainstalowane mowy głosy syntezie (tekst na mowę).

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Głos jest aparatem syntezy mowy (tekst na mowę lub TTS), który jest zainstalowany w systemie.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca kolekcję tylko do odczytu głosy aktualnie zainstalowane w systemie.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca wszystkie zainstalowane mowy głosy syntezie (tekst na mowę), które obsługuje określonych ustawień regionalnych.

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli żaden z zainstalowanych głosów obsługi określonych ustawień regionalnych, ta metoda zwraca pustą kolekcję.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows i interfejsu API System.Speech zaakceptować wszystkie prawidłowe kody języka kraju.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Aby wykonać przy użyciu języka określonego we właściwości kultury tekst na mowę, aparat syntezy mowy, który obsługuje kod kraju języka musi być zainstalowany.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Syntezy mowy silników dołączonej Microsoft Windows 7 robocze o następujących kodach kraju języka:-en US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Angielski (Stany Zjednoczone) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Chiński (Chiny) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Chiński (Tajwan) dwuliterowych kodów języków przykład "en", również są dozwolone.

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: Ustawienia regionalne muszą obsługiwać głosu.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca kolekcję tylko do odczytu głosy aktualnie zainstalowane w systemie, które obsługują określone ustawienia regionalne.

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Wstrzymuje <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy zostanie osiągnięty phoneme.

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: Phoneme jest podstawowym składnikiem napisane języka, zwykle litery alfabetu (lub kombinacja dwie litery), która reprezentuje jeden lub więcej dźwięków distinct.

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter “c” is a phoneme that may sound like “s” in “cinder”, or like “k” in “catch”.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład litera "c" jest phoneme, który może dźwięk, takich jak "s" w "cinder" lub "k" w "catch".

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Word zapisany jest łączenia się podzasobów fonemów.

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: Zmiany słów phoneme zmieni jego pisowni.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a PhonemeReached event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>wystąpienia generuje zdarzenie PhonemeReached dla każdej części programu word, który stanowi phoneme.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word “theme” would generate three PhonemeReached events; one for the “th” sound, one for the “e” sound, and one for the “m” sound (me).
trans-unit.target: Na przykład dla słowa "motywu" Generowanie trzy zdarzenia PhonemeReached; jeden dźwięk "th", dla dźwięk "e" i jeden dla dźwięk "m" (me).

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład i informacje o danych skojarzone ze zdarzeniem zobacz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia współczynnik wymowy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca stopę wymowy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu, od -10 do 10.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa leksykonie z <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Zobacz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>np.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: Lokalizacja dokumentu leksykonie.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: Wznawia <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu po jego wstrzymaniu.

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: Wybiera określonego głosu według nazwy.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>— Metoda i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasy można uzyskać nazwy zainstalowany głosy tekst na mowę (TTS), które można wybierać.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the SelectVoice method.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać głosu, Przekaż całą zawartość <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>właściwość jako argument dla metody SelectVoice.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Obiektu wybiera pierwszy zainstalowany głos zawierający `name` przy użyciu głosu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Właściwości.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Wykonuje z uwzględnieniem wielkości liter, porównanie podciąg do określenia, czy głos zgodne `name`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Gdy aplikacja wywołuje <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, ta metoda sprawdza, czy każdy głosy znajdzie się w rejestrze spełnia określone kryteria minimalne.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Wszelkie głosu Niepowodzenie weryfikacji <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>ustawia jego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>właściwości `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacji nie można wybrać głosu którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>jest właściwość `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Zwykle, aplikacje nie ustawi głosu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać głosu według płci, wieku lub ustawień regionalnych, użyj jednej z <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Nazwa głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender.
trans-unit.target: Wybiera głosu z określonych płci.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>— Metoda i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasy można uzyskać nazwy zainstalowany głosy tekst na mowę (TTS), które można wybierać.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> property matches the `gender` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Obiektu wybiera pierwszy zainstalowany głosu którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>dopasowania właściwości `gender` parametru.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Gdy aplikacja wywołuje <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, ta metoda sprawdza, czy każdy głosy znajdzie się w rejestrze spełnia określone kryteria minimalne.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Wszelkie głosu Niepowodzenie weryfikacji <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>ustawia jego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>właściwości `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacji nie można wybrać głosu którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>jest właściwość `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Zwykle, aplikacje nie ustawi głosu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać na podstawie innych charakterystyk głosu, zobacz drugi <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać głosu według nazwy, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: The gender of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Płeć głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender and age.
trans-unit.target: Wybiera głosu z określonych płci i wiek.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>— Metoda i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasy można uzyskać nazwy zainstalowany głosy tekst na mowę (TTS), które można wybierać.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Obiektu wybiera pierwszy zainstalowany głosu którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>dopasowania właściwości `gender` i `age` parametrów.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Gdy aplikacja wywołuje <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, ta metoda sprawdza, czy każdy głosy znajdzie się w rejestrze spełnia określone kryteria minimalne.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Wszelkie głosu Niepowodzenie weryfikacji <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>ustawia jego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>właściwości `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacji nie można wybrać głosu którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>jest właściwość `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Zwykle, aplikacje nie ustawi głosu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać na podstawie innych charakterystyk głosu, zobacz drugi <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać głosu według nazwy, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: The gender of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Płeć głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: The age of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Wiek głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender and age, based on the position in which the voices are ordered.
trans-unit.target: Wybiera głosu z określonych płci i wiek, na podstawie położenia, w którym głosy są uporządkowane.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>— Metoda i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasy można uzyskać nazwy zainstalowany głosy tekst na mowę (TTS), które można wybierać.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds installed voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Obiekt voices wyszukuje zainstalowane, którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>dopasowania właściwości `gender` i `age` parametrów.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Liczby dopasowań wyszukuje i zwraca głosu, gdy liczba jest równa `voiceAlternate` parametru.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Gdy aplikacja wywołuje <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, ta metoda sprawdza, czy każdy głosy znajdzie się w rejestrze spełnia określone kryteria minimalne.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Wszelkie głosu Niepowodzenie weryfikacji <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>ustawia jego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>właściwości `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacji nie można wybrać głosu którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>jest właściwość `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Zwykle, aplikacje nie ustawi głosu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać na podstawie innych charakterystyk głosu, zobacz drugi <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>przeciążeń.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać głosu według nazwy, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: The gender of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Płeć głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: The age of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Wiek głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: The position of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Pozycja głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender, age, and locale, based on the position in which the voices are ordered.
trans-unit.target: Wybiera głosu określonych płci, wieku i ustawień regionalnych, na podstawie położenia, w którym głosy są uporządkowane.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A> properties match the `gender`, `age`, and `culture` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Obiekt znajdzie voices, którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>, i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A>dopasowania właściwości `gender`, `age`, i `culture` parametrów.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Liczby dopasowań wyszukuje i zwraca głosu, gdy liczba jest równa `voiceAlternate` parametru.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows i interfejsu API System.Speech zaakceptować wszystkie prawidłowe kody języka kraju.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Aby wykonać tekst na mowę, przy użyciu języka określonego w `culture` parametr, aparat syntezy mowy, który obsługuje kod kraju język musi być zainstalowany.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Syntezy mowy silników dołączonej Microsoft Windows 7 robocze o następujących kodach kraju języka:-en US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Angielski (Stany Zjednoczone) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Chiński (Chiny) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Chiński (Tajwan) dwuliterowych kodów języków przykład "en", również są dozwolone.

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Gdy aplikacja wywołuje <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, ta metoda sprawdza, czy każdy głosy znajdzie się w rejestrze spełnia określone kryteria minimalne.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Wszelkie głosu Niepowodzenie weryfikacji <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>ustawia jego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>właściwości `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacji nie można wybrać głosu którego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>jest właściwość `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Zwykle, aplikacje nie ustawi głosu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać na podstawie innych charakterystyk głosu, zobacz drugi <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>przeciążeń.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Aby wybrać głosu według nazwy, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: The gender of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Płeć głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: The age of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Wiek głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: The position of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Pozycja głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: The locale of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Ustawienia regionalne głosu, aby wybrać.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object to append output to an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Konfiguruje <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiekt można dołączyć dane wyjściowe do strumienia audio.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Wywołanie <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>zwolnienia <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>przez odwołanie do strumienia.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Dla opcji konfiguracji, zobacz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: Strumień, do którego jest dołączany syntezy danych wyjściowych.

trans-unit.source: The format to use for the synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: Format danych wyjściowych syntezy.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object to send output to the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: Konfiguruje <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiekt do wysyłania danych wyjściowych do domyślnego urządzenia audio.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Sound** window in the Windows **Control Panel** to configure the default audio device for the computer.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć **dźwięk** okna w systemie Windows **Panelu sterowania** do konfigurowania domyślnego urządzenia audio dla komputera.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object to not send output from synthesis operations to a device, file, or stream.
trans-unit.target: Konfiguruje <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiekt, aby nie wysyłał danych wyjściowych z operacji syntezy do urządzenia, pliku lub strumienia.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> ‘s reference to a file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda służy do wersji <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>przez odwołanie do pliku lub strumienia.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: Anuluje operację asynchroniczną syntezy dla wiersza w kolejce.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda również służy do anulowania asynchronicznego mowy operacji dla następujących:-zawartość <xref:System.String>określonego przez <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>— Metoda.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -Zawartość <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>określonego przez <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: Podczas wywoływania <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, tworzy System.Speech <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>obiektu i wypełnia zawartość parametru metody i zwraca <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>obiektu.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into SpeakAsyncCancel to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Aby zachować kopię zwróconego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, przekaż go do SpeakAsyncCancel anulować wymowy zawartości określonych w <xref:System.String>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>obiektu.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.target: Zawartość, do których chcesz anulować operację speak.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: Umożliwia anulowanie operacji syntezy wszystkich umieszczonych w kolejce, asynchroniczny, mowy.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> zakończeniu mówiąc monit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the SpeakCompleted event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Wywołuje zdarzenie SpeakCompleted po zakończeniu tych <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>Klasa nie ma właściwości, a nie zwrócił danych ze zdarzenia SpeakCompleted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Zapewniała umożliwia autorom aplikacji do obsługi zdarzeń dla zdarzenia SpeakCompleted zapisu.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Zgłoszono po <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> mówi każdego pojedynczego wyrazu monit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Zgłasza to zdarzenie dla każdego nowego wyrazu, który obsługuje monit przy użyciu dowolnego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład i więcej informacji na temat dane skojarzone ze zdarzeniem zobacz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <xref:System.String> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Synchronicznie mówi <xref:System.String>zawierający znaczników SSML.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: Zawartość `textToSpeak` musi zawierać parametr `speak` element i musi być zgodna z [mowy syntezy Markup Language (SSML) w wersji 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz [mowy syntezy Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Asynchronicznie porozmawiać ciąg, który zawiera SSML znaczników, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> to initiate the synchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>zainicjować synchroniczne mówiąc ciągu, który nie zawiera znacznika SSML.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Podczas wywoływania tej metody <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>może wiązać się z następujących zdarzeń:- <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Uruchamiany po zmianie stanu syntezatora mowy.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy rozpoczyna syntezatora mowy generowania.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane zawsze, gdy osiągnie Syntezator literą lub kombinacją liter stanowią niejawnego dźwięk mowy w języku.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Podnoszony, zawsze Syntezator kończy się mówiąc wyrazu.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane każdorazowo rozmowy dane wyjściowe wymaga zmiany w położeniu ujścia lub mięśni twarzy użyta do wyprodukowania mowy.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy praca syntezatora napotka zakładki w wierszu.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy zmienia się delikatnego głosu dla Syntezator.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing the SpeakSsml method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Nie zgłaszał <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>zdarzenia podczas przetwarzania metody SpeakSsml.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy praca syntezatora zakończeniu przetwarzania operacji SpeakSsmlAsync.

trans-unit.source: If your application dos not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli Twoje dos aplikacji nie trzeba wykonywać zadań podczas trwania mowy, możesz użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>do generowania mowy synchronicznie.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> rozpoczyna się mówiąc monit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Zgłasza tego zdarzenia, kiedy rozpoczyna przetwarzanie monit przy użyciu dowolnego <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>Klasa nie ma właściwości, a nie zwrócił danych ze zdarzenia SpeakStarted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: Zapewniała umożliwia autorom aplikacji do obsługi zdarzeń dla zdarzenia SpeakStarted zapisu.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera bieżący stan mówiąc <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać nowy stan <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>po nim zmiany, należy użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>właściwości <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>klasy.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca bieżący stan wymowy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy stan <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> zmiany.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Zgłasza to zdarzenie po jego mówiąc <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>zmian.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład i więcej informacji na temat dane skojarzone ze zdarzeniem zobacz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Aby wstrzymać lub wznowić syntezy mowy, należy użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy zostanie osiągnięty viseme.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Viseme to podstawowe pozycja ujścia i twarzy przy wymawianiu phoneme.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes to wizualne reprezentacje fonemów.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System.Speech obsługuje 21 visemes US English, z których każdy odpowiada fonemów jeden lub więcej.

trans-unit.source: VisemeReached events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: Zdarzenia VisemeReached są wywoływane, gdy nowy phoneme, osiągnięto ma inną viseme odpowiedniego niż poprzednie phoneme, osiągnięto.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a VisemeReached event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Ponieważ niektóre visemes stanowią więcej niż jeden phoneme, zdarzenie VisemeReached nie jest generowany, gdy dalej phoneme, osiągnięto odnosi się do tej samej viseme jako phoneme poprzedniej.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words “this zone”, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the “s” in “this” and the “z” in “zone”.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład w przypadku rozmowy wyrazy "tej strefy" <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>zdarzenia "s" w "to" i "z" w "w strefie".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: However, a VisemeReached event is not raised for the “z” in “zone” because it corresponds to the same viseme as the “s” in “this”.
trans-unit.target: Jednak zdarzenie VisemeReached nie jest wywoływane dla "z" w "strefy", ponieważ odnosi się do tej samej viseme jako "s" w "this".

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: Poniżej znajduje się lista 21 fonemów SAPI i phoneme grup, które odpowiadają viseme w US English.

trans-unit.source: |Viseme|Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |0|silence| |1|ae, ax, ah| |2|aa| |3|ao| |4|ey, eh, uh| |5|er| |6|y, iy, ih, ix| |7|w, uw| |8|ow| |9|aw| |10|oy| |11|ay| |12|h| |13|r| |14|l| |15|s, z| |16|sh, ch, jh, zh| |17|th, dh| |18|f, v| |19|d, t, n| |20|k, g, ng| |21|p, b, m| For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: | Viseme | Phoneme(s) | |------------|------------------| |&0; | wyciszenia | |&1; | ae, ax, ah | |&2; | aa | |&3; | ao | |&4; | ey, eh, Niestety | |&5; | era | |&6; | y, iy, umożliwiają, popraw | |&7; | w, uw | |&8; | Pokaż | |&9; | aw | |&10; | oy | |&11; | ay | |&12; | h | |&13; | r | |&14; | l | |&15; | s, z | |&16; | sh, ch, jh, zh | |&17; | th, dh | |&18; | f, v | |&19; | d, t, n | |&20; | k, g, ng | |&21; | p, m, b | Informacje o danych skojarzonych z `VisemeReached` zdarzeń, zobacz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera informacje o bieżącym głos <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Podczas inicjowania nowy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, używa głos domyślny system.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Aby skonfigurować <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>obiektów, użyj jednej z głosy syntezie mowy zainstalowany, należy użyć <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać informacje o tym, które są zainstalowane głosy, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metody i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasy.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca informacje o bieżącym głos <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Wywoływane, gdy głos <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> zmiany.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład i informacje o danych skojarzone ze zdarzeniem zobacz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Można zmienić głos który <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>korzysta ze wszystkimi <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>w <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>metody lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>w <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Do dodania.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wielkość danych wyjściowych <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca ilość <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>, od 0 do 100.
